PSCT.Base: Target 1 "Vanquish Soul" monster you control; Special Summon up to 2 "Vanquish Soul" monsters from your hand, with different names from each other, neither of which has the same original Attribute as the targeted monster (but negate their effects and return them to the hand during the End Phase), then you can return to the hand all cards your opponent controls that are in the same columns as the targeted monster you control and the monster(s) Special Summoned by this effect. You can only activate 1 "Vanquish Soul Trinity Burst" per turn.
